snippet: The Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty named David M. Frankel, the city’s finance commissioner, as executive director to replace William E. Rapfogel, who was fired last week.
abstract: Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty names David M Frankel, New York City’s finance commissioner, as executive director and chief executive; replaces William E Rapfogel, who was dismissed amid allegations of financial misconduct after serving for two decades in those posts.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty named David M. Frankel, the city’s finance commissioner, as executive director to replace William E. Rapfogel, who was fired last week.

headline.main: Poverty Group Appoints City Official as New Chief
headline.print_headline: Poverty Group Appoints City Official As New Chief
